H0.text: Medium is what the speed of sound depends on.

H1.text: Light is the factor that the speed of sound depends on.

H2.text: Volume is the factor that the speed of sound depends on.

H3.text: Temperature is what the speed of sound depends on.

A4.text: The speed of sound is variable and depends on the properties of the substance through which the wave is travelling.

A5.text: The speed of sound is proportional to the square root of the absolute temperature, giving an increase of about 0.6 m/s per degree Celsius.

A6.text: Speed of sound depends on temperature, not air pressure.
